selected_skills.name: extract_ages_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract ages of Alice and Bob from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to read the ages from the image data and return them as a tuple.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the age gap by subtraction.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to subtract Bob's age from Alice's age to find the age gap.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed age gap into the required answer format.
